mapper.sql: SELECT w.id as id, w.userid as userid, w.place_id as place_id, w.wish_date as wish_date, w.personal_note as personal_note, h.name as hotplace_name, h.address as hotplace_address, h.lat as hotplace_lat, h.lng as hotplace_lng, h.category_id as hotplace_category_id, h.region_id as hotplace_region_id, h.created_at as hotplace_created_at, m.nickname as user_nickname, c.name as category_name FROM wishlist w LEFT JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id LEFT JOIN member m ON w.userid = m.userid LEFT JOIN place_category c ON h.category_id = c.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wishlist ( userid, place_id, wish_date, personal_note ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{place_id}, #{wishDate}, #{personal_note} )
mapper.select: SELECT w.place_id FROM wishlist w GROUP BY w.place_id ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT h.id as place_id, h.name as hotplace_name, h.address as hotplace_address, h.lat, h.lng, h.category_id, h.region_id, h.created_at, COUNT(w.id) as wish_count FROM wishlist w JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id GROUP BY h.id, h.name, h.address, h.lat, h.lng, h.category_id, h.region_id, h.created_at ORDER BY wish_count DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT h.region_id, COUNT(*) as wish_count, COUNT(DISTINCT w.userid) as unique_users, COUNT(DISTINCT h.id) as unique_hotplaces FROM wishlist w JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id WHERE h.region_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY h.region_id ORDER BY wish_count DESC

SELECT c.name as category_name, COUNT(*) as wish_count, COUNT(DISTINCT w.userid) as unique_users, COUNT(DISTINCT h.id) as unique_hotplaces FROM wishlist w JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id JOIN category c ON h.category_id = c.id WHERE c.name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY wish_count DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(wish_date, '%Y-%m') as month, COUNT(*) as wish_count, COUNT(DISTINCT userid) as unique_users, COUNT(DISTINCT place_id) as unique_hotplaces FROM wishlist WHERE wish_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(wish_date, '%Y-%m') ORDER BY month DESC

SELECT h.region_id, COUNT(*) as wish_count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wishlist WHERE userid = #{userId}), 2) as percentage FROM wishlist w JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id WHERE w.userid = #{userId} AND h.region_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY h.region_id ORDER BY wish_count DESC

SELECT c.name as category_name, COUNT(*) as wish_count, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wishlist WHERE userid = #{userId}), 2) as percentage FROM wishlist w JOIN hotplace_info h ON w.place_id = h.id JOIN category c ON h.category_id = c.id WHERE w.userid = #{userId} AND c.name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY wish_count DESC
